channel.title: Welcome to Planck Bridge on
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to Planck Bridge on

item.title: Interest Rates
item.description:
Saron
This is a TEST. SARON stands for Swiss Average Rate Overnight. It represents the overnight interest rate of the secured funding market for Swiss francs, specifically the repo (repurchase agreement) market where banks lend to each other using high-quality collateral, such as government bonds.

item.title: What Stock Indexes Teach Us
item.description: This text explores why it has been challenging to beat indexes like the S&P 500 over long time horizons and how we can use this information to build a momentum trading strategy. It also discusses the similarities between trading and poker. Overall, the goal of this text is to introduce momentum trading, which will be explored further in another post.

Asset Analysis App: Visit here
This tool allows users to analyze and compare the returns of financial assets. All calculations are based on daily adjusted closing prices, fetched directly from Yahoo Finance using the yfinance API.

Variance Monte Carlo Simulation: Visit here
This tool is a test.
